4 Meme

Jan 27, 2006

I’ve never been tagged for one of these blogger memes before, but now that M E-L’s tagged me I have no choice but to join the borg:

{four, meme} **Four Jobs I’ve Had:** * Bartender * Ice cream vendor * Office temp * Oh, and college professor… **Four movies I can watch over and over:** * Eight and a half * Dancer in the Dark * The Seventh Seal * Cool Hand Luke **Four places I have lived:** * Hoboken, NJ * Taipei, Taiwan * Philadelphia, PA * Jackson Heights, NY **Four television shows I love to watch:** * Boondocks * The Daily Show * My Name is Earl * Malcolm in the Middle **Four places I have been on vacation:** * Bar Harbor, ME * Derha Dun, India * Iceland * New Orleans, LA **Four of my favorite dishes:** * Masala Dosa * Boiled Dumplings * Stinky Tofu * Pumpkin Pie **Four websites I visit daily:** * Boing Boing * Political Animal * Savage Minds * BBC News **Four places I would rather be right now:** * Chharangar * In a hammock somewhere, reading a book… * Taipei, Taiwan – eating my favorite foods… * Somewhere with trees, water, mountains, etc. **Four books you’ve recently read that more people should read:** * A People’s History of the United States * City of Salt * Family Matters * Branded by Law **Four bloggers I am tagging:** * This meme ends here!
